author: Jonny Rocket
comment: I like this radio app, It just needs polished as signal keeps dropping out every 5 seconds. If this was fixed I'd be happy to give 5 stars.

author: Daniel Nathan
comment: Poor UI, unstable app. Waste of money. Developer refusing to refund.

reply.author: DrewApps
reply.content:
Hi all, because of the refund Daniel is not able to adjust his bad review. We will have to ask google to delete this review.

In the mean time we want to say this:
So many positive feedback can't be all wrong.
The UI is a mather of taste. We think it is functional. Some radio's are not steaming well but there are plenty who work just fine.

author: Dave J
comment: Great little app for streaming radio through the speaker on your watch. More stations being added, and requests accepted by developer.

author: Neil Haniford
comment: Great app. Please add WGR RADIO 550 AM from USA. Thanks.

author: setyo bratta
comment: I already purchase this app and it works with my huawei watch 2.. can you add radio from Indonesia for the next update.. thank you..

reply.author: DrewApps
reply.content: Hi thanks for the positive feedback! Several Indonesian radio station are added for next update. Enjoy!

author: Chris Snape
comment: Excellent radio app for android wear and developer happy to help if you have a request.

author: RENEGADE RETAILER
comment: Would like to have CJAD Montreal. Otherwise would need a refund.

reply.author: DrewApps
reply.content: CJAD Montreal has been added to the next app release. Update your wear app and enjoy!

author: kevin gildea
comment: Need support for Ireland radio stations

reply.author: DrewApps
reply.content: Dear Kevin, if you (or any user) send me an email with your favourite radio stations. I will be happy to include those stations in the next update.

author: Yuval Keren
comment: Excellent app, and prompt response from the authors when asked to add certain stations. It seriously drains the watch battery though so be prepared for more frequent charges.
